Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacteria:Escherichia coli ATCC 25923 (MIC=0.8 µM), Klebsiella pneumoniae (MIC=3.35 µM), Acinetobacter sp. (MIC=3.35 µM), Psudomonas aruginosa (MIC=6.71 µM).Fungi:Candida albicans ATCC SC5314 (MIC=10.49 µM), C. tropicalis ATCC 13803 (MIC=20.98 µM), C. parapsilosis ATCC 22019 (MIC=5.24 µM).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry

Literature.Title: A novel antimicrobial peptide derived from modified N-terminal domain of bovine lactoferrin Design, synthesis, activity against multidrug-resistant bacteria and Candida.
Literature.Author: Mishra B, Leishangthem GD, Gill K, Singh AK, Das S, Singh K, Xess I, Dinda A, Kapil A, Patro IK, Dey S.
